channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring -- Spring Cloud Contract
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spring -- Spring Cloud Contract

item.title: CVE-2024-22236|2024-08-23T19:28:54.431Z -- spring -- spring%20cloud%20contract
item.description: In Spring Cloud Contract, versions 4.1.x prior to 4.1.1, versions 4.0.x prior to 4.0.5, and versions 3.1.x prior to 3.1.10, test execution is vulnerable to local information disclosure via temporary directory created with unsafe permissions through the shaded com.google.guava:guava dependency in the org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-contract-shade dependency.
